name: MillennialNews
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Add this skill to your Alexa skills. Listen to daily updates from your favorite source. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime. This skill will play along with any other flash briefings that you have saved.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
